SELECT SUM(ROUND(t2.budget_count* t2.budget_amount,2)) as account_total, SUM(ROUND(t2.budget_count*IFNULL(t3.min_cost,0),2))+SUM(ROUND(IF(t2.budget_code is null or t2.budget_code='',t2.budget_amount*budget_count,0),2)) as min_account_total, SUM(ROUND(t2.budget_count*IFNULL(t3.max_cost,0),2))+SUM(ROUND(IF(t2.budget_code is null or t2.budget_code='',t2.budget_amount*budget_count,0),2)) as max_account_total FROM sbdb.house_info AS t1 INNER JOIN house_budget_info AS t2 ON t1.house_code = t2.house_code INNER JOIN house_detail_info AS t4 ON t2.house_detail_code = t4.house_detail_code LEFT JOIN budget_info AS t3 ON t2.budget_code=t3.budget_code AND t3.`status`=0 WHERE t1.`status` = 0 AND t2.`status` = 0 AND t4.`status` = 0
AND t1.mobile_phone=#{mobilePhone}
